info.description: Rest API for Launch External URL Service
info.title: Launch External URL

post.description: returns the launch external url configuration for the form field

parameters.name: company-uid
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the company in question

parameters.name: concur-correlationid
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the consumer making the API calls. Minimum length: 6 characters

parameters.name: concur-uid
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the logged in user (required when using user jwt)

200.description: Successfully retrieved launch external url config

400.description: Bad Request - Your request is missing parameters. Please verify and resubmit.

401.description: Full authentication is required to access this resource.

500.description: Internal server error, please contact the administrator.

503.description: The service is unavailable either due to being offline or refusing the connection

get.description: returns Launch external url version configured for the form field

parameters.name: company-uid
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the company in question

parameters.name: concur-correlationid
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the consumer making the API calls. Minimum length: 6 characters

parameters.name: concur-uid
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the logged in user (required when using user jwt)

200.description: Successfully retrieved launch external url version

400.description: Bad Request - Your request is missing parameters. Please verify and resubmit.

401.description: Full authentication is required to access this resource.

500.description: Internal server error, please contact the administrator.

503.description: The service is unavailable either due to being offline or refusing the connection

get.summary: Get current server time and git commit sha of deployed LEU

parameters.name: company-uid
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the company in question

parameters.name: concur-correlationid
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the consumer making the API calls. Minimum length: 6 characters

parameters.name: concur-uid
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the logged in user (required when using user jwt)

400.description: Bad Request - Your request is missing parameters. Please verify and resubmit.

401.description: Full authentication is required to access this resource.

500.description: Internal server error, please contact the administrator.

errorId.description: The unique identifier of the error associated with the response or is it error response itself

httpStatus.description: The http response code and phrase for the response

path.description: The URI of the attempted request

timestamp.description: The time when the error was captured

allocation_id.description: The allocation ID is required for report allocation

context_type.description: The context type would most likely be TRAVELER, and that is dependent on the JWT conversation

expense_ids.description: A list of expense IDs is required for report entry and allocation

form_field_id.description: The form field ID is required to call EMT for the popup window height and width.

is_mobile.description: A boolean (set to false as default) to know if the request is coming from Mobile

logged_in_user_id.description: UUID of the user, can also be the expense delegate instead of report owner

logged_in_user_login_id.description: The SAP Concur user ID of the logged-in user

report_id.description: The report ID is required for report entry, allocation, and header

rpe_key.description: The report entry key is required for v1 only

rpt_key.description: The report header key is required for v1 only

client_url.description: value = Client popup url along with data as query parameter, needed by client to update report using Concur callback url

leu_version.description: value = Launch external url version configured for the field / connector

popup_height.description: value = Display specifics for popup window

popup_width.description: value = Display specifics for popup window

leu_version.description: value = Launch external url version configured for the field / connector

message.description: The detailed message of the validation error

source.description: The type of validation which failed
